Html: I've got a program where I'm dropping down and moving a bunch of markers. So I thought I came up with a cagey way to create a system of undos, where whenever a marker is changed or moved, I'd copy the overlay. That way i could move backwards through the overlays to show each previous set of conditions. However, everything I seem to do copies the current state of the overlay to all of the other copies. I tried the "CopyTo" method and got the same result. There must be a better way. Anyone have any thoughts?
overlay is just a list of markers, copy markers instead, or add position stack to custom marker position
Gotchya. Thanks!
